articles.author: Feroz Khan
articles.title: 'I Made a Terrible Mistake': AB de Villiers Admits he Shared 'False Information' on Virat Kohli - News18
articles.description: South Africa batting legend AB de Villiers had claimed Virat Kohli's second child is on the way on his YouTube channel.
articles.content: The unconfirmed reports of Virat Kohli expected to miss the remainder of the ongoing England Test series have resulted in speculations over India batting superstars absence. Kohli was initially named… [+1652 chars]
